entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
